title: Masteries
body: i played a lee sin game and got mastery 5 on him after we won, i also got an s- so why didn't i get a mastery token?

replies.body: It's actually not possible to earn level 5 and a token at the same time.  You need to have already been level 5 to receive a token, per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Any notification you might have received would be an introduction to the token system, and not that you received one.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Unfortunately, you cannot get a mastery 6 token for a champion in the same game you reach mastery 5 on that champion. You can only get them for games afterwards.
